title: Sideshow
description: Nine-year old Hailey Ames is hunted by an evil that shadows her. Can she and her new companions, members of an unusual circus, run fast and far enough for fate to lose Hailey's trail? Will Hailey be able to make the choices that will ultimately save her and her friends, or doom them all? Sideshow is a tale of horrors overcome and the triumph of the human spirit. Hailey Ames is a unique girl, faced with problems that most adults would recoil from facing. Ultimately, her own salvation lies within herself and her ability to make the most difficult decisions, with the help of a few strange and wonderful friends.
author: Chrystal Vaughan
